name: Prosper

topics.topic_text: I'm not taking you anywhere. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: Thank you! Thank you so much!

topics.topic_text: Good. Now get out of here before I change my mind.
topics.response_text: Yes... ma'am. Yes, we will. Thank you, again. You're very kind.

topics.topic_text: Thanks. Now take off. I'm done with you.
topics.response_text: Yes... ma'am. Yes, we will. Thank you, again. You're very kind.

topics.topic_text: Just get out of my sight. I don't care where you go.
topics.response_text: Wait... we're free? You're serious? You're just going to let us go? Thank you! Thank you so much!

topics.topic_text: I need a set of slave clothes. Where can I get some?
topics.response_text: That guy over there on the mattress died last night. I never did get his name.

topics.topic_text: Great. Thanks. Be careful out there.
topics.response_text: We will. Thank you again, stranger. We owe you our lives.

topics.topic_text: Gross. I'm not wearing a dead guy's clothes. Give me yours. Now.
topics.response_text: My clothes? Off my back? Well... I guess. You did help us. I'm sure... I'm sure I'll make do out there in the wastes.

topics.topic_text: I need your clothes. Give them to me. Now.
topics.response_text: My clothes? Off my back? Well... I guess. You did help us. I'm sure... I'm sure I'll make do out there in the wastes.
Oh my god... are? You killed them! Are you real? You're here to save us? Where are we going?

description:
Prosper is a 32 year-old Caucasian Male.

Prosper is a weary-looking slave in his early thirties, with a gaunt face and haunted eyes that betray his past life as a smuggler. He wears tattered rags that barely cover his malnourished frame, constantly shifting his weight from foot to foot as if ready to flee at any moment. His hands are calloused from years of hard labor, though not from the work he currently endures.

Prosper's Personality: Prosper is deeply paranoid and nervous, always scanning his surroundings for potential threats. He speaks in hushed tones, as if afraid of being overheard. Despite his current desperate situation, remnants of his cautious smuggler personality remain, making him careful with his words and actions. He maintains a neutral moral alignment, having done questionable things for survival but not actively malicious.

Prosper's Backstory: Born and raised in the industrial wasteland of The Pitt, Prosper learned the harsh realities of survival from a young age. He eventually became involved in smuggling operations, transporting steel ingots from The Pitt to various settlements in the Capital Wasteland. His operation was successful for years, thanks to his careful planning and paranoia. However, his luck ran out when a deal went wrong, resulting in the deaths of most of his crew. The survivors, including Prosper, were captured and sold to slavers operating out of Paradise Falls. Now, he's trapped in the train tunnel, awaiting his fate while desperately clinging to the hope of escape.
